text: Aur her ummat kay liye hum ney qurbani kay tareeqay muqarrar farmaye hain takay woh inn chopaye janwaron per Allah ka naam len jo Allah ney unhen dey rakhay hain. Samajh lo kay tum sab ka mabood-e-bar haq sirf aik hi hai tum ussi kay tabey farmaan ho jao aajzi kerney walon ko khuskhabri suna dijiye
